content: The kings are in distant opposition when there are (vertically, horizontally, or diagonally) three or five squares between them, not just one.
translations: ita:I re sono in lontananza in opposizione quando ci sono (verticalmente, orizzontalmente o diagonalmente) tre o cinque case
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
